text: Ate jadom asim isara'ila di aulada tom vacana li'a ki tusim alaha tom ilava kise hora di badagi nahim karoge ate tusim bhala vihara karoge, mata-pita de nala, risatedaram de nala, anatham ate kagalam de zakata ada karo phira tusim usa tom mukara ga'e siva'e kujha lokam de ate tusim vacana de ke usa tom piche hata jana vale loka ho
